name: csrf-demo
description: simple demonstration of csrf vulnerability and mitigation

scripts.start: npx webpack -p && env NODE_ENV=production node server/index.js
scripts.start-dev: npx webpack -d && env NODE_ENV=development node server/index.js
scripts.start-win: npx webpack -p && set NODE_ENV=production && node server\index.js
scripts.start-dev-win: npx webpack -d && set NODE_ENV=development && node server\index.js

author: Brook Li
